item.title: CV
item.description:
I am interested in languages, photography, and cats.

Basic information

  • Name: Yu Sawai
  • Nationality: Japanese
  • Gender: Male

Education

  • Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Nara, Japan.
    Studied computational linguistics and information science (MEng).
  • Doshisha Univ., Kyoto, Japan.
    Studied mechanical engineering and fluid engineering.

Experience

  • Current
    • CAE/HPC/Data-mining application engineer at a tokyo-based manufacturing company
  • Past
    • Assistant researcher at Institut fur Polymerwerkstoff und Kunststofftechnik of TU Clausthal, Germany as an IAESTE intern (2010.09-12)

Skills

Natural Languages

  • Japanese (native)
  • English
    • TOEIC score 935⁄990 (June, 2012)
    • IELTS band score 7.0/9.0 (Nov. 2014)
  • German (learning, forever beginner)

Tech

  • Python 2⁄3
    • Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-learn, Pandas
  • Apache Spark (Cloudera CDH)
  • Scala
  • Mac OS X
  • Linux (CentOS6x)
  • Vim (novice)
  • Shell script (bash)
  • git (novice)
  • HTML/CSS (novice)
  • LaTeX
  • Lava/LSF
